text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The response explicitly addresses the validity of the international license by stating: \"Whether it's valid for driving in the UK depends on several factors - how long you've been resident in the UK, which country issued it, etc. If you've been resident long enough that you were required to exchange or take a UK test, it may no longer be valid here.\" This directly covers the condition mentioned in the criterion regarding the 12-month residency rule (or the requirement to exchange/test based on residency duration).", "criterion_id": "c8845168-a020-468e-82d1-f43503ee0c57"}
